short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to easily copy the table part of a ChatGPT response into markdown syntax and images

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step
1. Click "Table copy" button to convert HTML table of ChatGPT response to markdown table
2. Paste anywhere you want markdown table 

https://chatgptable.xideprojext.xyz/
